item.title: Stacy add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "You can always tell what kind of a person a man really thinks you are by the earrings he gives you." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Paris is always a good idea." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "If I get married, I want to be very married." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!" -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "Everything in this room is edible. Even I'm edible. But, that would be called canibalism. It is looked down upon in most societies." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Ice-cream is exquisite. What a pity it isn't illegal." -- Voltaire

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "She said she usually cried at least once each day not because she was sad, but because the world was so beautiful & life was so short." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Anatole France
item.description: "The books that everybody admires are those that nobody reads." -- Anatole France

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "A woman who doesn't wear perfume has no future." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Mike Schmoker
item.description: "Nostalgia is a seductive liar." -- Mike Schmoker

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Malcolm de Chazal
item.description: "The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs." -- Malcolm de Chazal

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "If only we could pull out our brain and use only our eyes." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish, but have eternal life." -- Anonymous

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap." -- Anonymous
